title: The Windscar Gate
description: Gusts whistle through jagged gaps in the rusted bars, scattering flakes of iron across the stone at your feet.

onEnter.log: The gate towers above you like a dead giant's ribs. Beyond it, the Citadel broods in silence.

exits.log: You brace your shoulders and shove. The gate groans open just enough for you to slip inside.
